body:
### Steps to reproduce the issue

I noticed a change of behavior of the following scenario between spack@v0.12.1 and spack@develop :
 
```console
$ module load gcc/8.1.0
$ spack compiler find
```

### The problem

On "release" tag v0.12.1, the compiler is found, on the develop branch, it isn’t.

### System information 

The issue occurs on a supercomputer using lmod mechanism for modules.
title: spack unable to find an lmod loaded compiler
